examples: There's a dish of mango with sweet sticky rice.
Hay un plato de mango con arroz pegajoso dulce.
Stir in the milk to make a soft but not sticky dough.
Agregue la leche para hacer una masa suave pero no pegajosa.
Her arms were covered in a sticky substance that could only be blood.
Sus brazos estaban cubiertos de una sustancia pegajosa que solo podía ser sangre.
